Article.ArticleTitle: Post-pandemic seasonal dynamics of hospitalised COPD exacerbations and aetiologies in the COPD population.

Abstract.AbstractText: This study uncovered a reversal of seasonal variation in hospitalised COPD exacerbation events after the COVID-19 pandemic. Investigation of updated seasonal exacerbation patterns and triggers can help initiate preventive strategies effectively. https://bit.ly/3wN71h0.
